titles.title: Rural Broadband Investment Tax Credit Act
Rural Broadband Investment Tax Credit Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide an investment credit for qualified broadband projects.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Rural Broadband Investment Tax Credit Act
This bill allows a new tax credit for up to 10% of investment in qualifying broadband projects, subject to specified limitations. The bill includes in the definition of qualifying broadband project any project that is designed solely to provide broadband service to one or more rural areas in which more than 50% of households lack access to adequate broadband service.
